document_data.name: ''Silver Pendant''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Silver pendant''''' was an unassuming and duty but [[enchanted]] [[amulet]], delicately engraved with the [[Harper]] symbol.
document_data.Powers: The wearer of this ''silver pendant'' was granted the ability to cast the ''[[guidance]]'' [[spell]] at will.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, this ''silver pendant'' was found on skeletal remains of a [[humanoid]] atop a small cliff southwest of the [[Emerald Grove]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] along the [[River Chionthar]].
